title: Hide the 6th column from the SheetViewer table

requirements.text: In the SheetViewer page, hide the 6th column (index 5) from both the table header row and all data rows so it is never rendered in the UI. The column should be skipped during render — neither the <th> header cell nor any <td> data cell for that column index should appear in the DOM. All other columns must continue to display normally.

quotes: 6 columns row it is written to be hide

acceptanceCriteria: The 6th column (index 5) header cell is not rendered in the table header row.
No data cell for the 6th column (index 5) is rendered in any table data row.
All other columns (indices 0–4 and 6+) continue to display correctly.
The table layout and styling remain intact after removing the 6th column.
The column/row count summary in the page header accurately reflects the displayed columns (i.e., total columns minus 1 hidden).

constraints: Do not modify any backend files.
Do not modify any files listed under frontend.immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Making the hidden column configurable or toggleable via the UI.
Hiding any column other than the 6th (index 5).
Any backend schema or data changes.
